mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_token_abnormal_log ( token_id, user_no, access_token, event_type, severity_level, details, occurred_at, ip_address, user_agent, fingerprint, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{tokenId}, #{userNo}, #{accessToken}, #{eventType}, #{severityLevel}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occurredAt}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{fingerprint}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
